snippet: Chuck Pagano provided the inspiration while Andrew Luck delivered a memorable performance in yet another win for Indianapolis on Sunday.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Indianapolis Colts outlast Miami Dolphins, 23-20; Indy coach Chuck Pagano provides inspiration, attending his first game since beginning treatment for leukemia; Colts quarterback Andrew Luck breaks rookie single-game passing record with 433 yards and two touchdowns; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Chuck Pagano provided the inspiration while Andrew Luck delivered a memorable performance in yet another win for Indianapolis on Sunday.

headline.seo: Colts’ Andrew Luck Sets Record in Chuck Pagano’s First Visit
headline.main: In Pagano’s First Visit, Colts’ Luck Sets a Record
headline.print_headline: In Pagano’s First Visit, Colts’ Luck Sets a Record
